definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
Ornithopoda, suborder of herbivorous dinosaurs including iguanodon

sentences.english: The lake lies low by the hill, a tearful entreaty of love at the foot of the inflexible.
sentences.chinese: 湖躺在山脚下，像在执拗者的跟前含泪恳求爱。

sentences.english: Passersby, one by one, threw paper money and coins into the small bucket beside his feet.
sentences.chinese: 过路人纷纷向他脚下的一个小铁桶里扔着纸币和硬币。

sentences.english: The soldiers were standing under the castle wall.
sentences.chinese: 战士们站在城堡的墙脚下。

sentences.english: “The Land Down Under” is Australia’s unofficial nickname.
sentences.chinese: “脚下那边的土地”是人们对澳大利亚的别称。

sentences.english: Foot of the mountain there is a clear bottoming out of the creek, streams next to the terraces.
sentences.chinese: 山脚下有一条清澈见底的小溪，小溪旁边是梯田。

sentences.english: Foot a slippery, what the rich and honored trip and fall down and directly come to a mouth to chew mire.
sentences.chinese: 脚下一滑，何富贵摔了一跤，直接来了个嘴啃泥。

sentences.english: The road is extending under my feet.
sentences.chinese: 路在我的脚下慢慢的延长。

sentences.english: The frightened slaves groveled at the feet of their cruel master.
sentences.chinese: 奴隶匍匐在残暴的主人脚下。

sentences.english: This temple on which you stand is the Chariot of Helios.
sentences.chinese: 你现在脚下的这座神殿正是赫利俄斯的太阳战车。

sentences.english: Soft leather lining wicks away moisture leaving the foot cool and dry.
sentences.chinese: 排湿离开脚下的阴凉，干燥的软皮衬里。

sentences.english: We hold the same hope, stepping a further and further road.
sentences.chinese: 我们拥有一样的希望，把脚下的路越踩越长。

sentences.english: Out feet slumped repeatedly through the melting ice.
sentences.chinese: 我们在冻冰的路面上走过，脚下打滑。

sentences.english: Fortunately, we manage to assemble at the foot of the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 但可幸我们全部相聚于山脚下。

sentences.english: The ground suddenly sank under his feet.
sentences.chinese: 他脚下的土地突然陷下去了。

sentences.english: The temple on which Kratos stood, was the Sun Chariot of Helios.
sentences.chinese: 奎托斯脚下的这座神殿，就是赫利俄斯的日头战车。

sentences.english: And my own ways are under my own feet.
sentences.chinese: 我不怕天，也不怕地，自己的路儿在脚下。

definition: to tread/to stamp/to step on/to press a pedal/to investigate on the spot
be high up in the sky
to recoil/to draw back/to fall back/to retreat
